about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This flying legend is the descendant of the venerable Messerschmitt Bf 110 series and the forebear of the mighty and wildly popular Messerschmitt Me 410.
This heavy fighter has it all: machineguns, autocannons, a defensive turret and even bombs, so you can engage anything you spot on the battlefield!

DLC Content:
  • The Messerschmitt Me 210, the German Tier V premium heavy fighter.
  • Hangar slot: allows you to put your warbird in the Hangar.
  • Fully trained pilot to boost your battle efficiency.
  • Ultimate Collimator Sight (Period II).
  • Utimate Gas Operated Action (Period II)
  • Ultimate Engine Boost Mix Injection System (Period II)

This flying legend is the descendant of the venerable Messerschmitt Bf 110 series and the forebear of the mighty and wildly popular Messerschmitt Me 410.
This heavy fighter has it all: machineguns, autocannons, a defensive turret and even bombs, so you can engage anything you spot on the battlefield!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768

short_description: This flying legend is the ancestor of the venerable Messerschmitt Bf 110 series and the forebear of the mighty and wildly popular Messerschmitt Me 410.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, German*, Polish*, Czech*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Croatian
*languages with full audio support
